mil3.6.8:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.6.8:0.3_0: and wisdom come to an end.
mil3.6.8:1.2_0: “Are you afraid of only by a dragon?”
mil3.6.8:1.4_0: “Well then, sir, no matter what Nāgadatta says.”
mil3.6.8:1.5_0: “Great king, since you mis took back?”
mil3.6.8:1.7_0: “Well then, great king, is none of these things.”
